name: SinCannon
description:
SinCannon (read: Sine Cannon) is a 2-4 player local deathmatch with the deadliest weaponry imaginable -- trigonometric functions.

The territorial intensity of Atari Warlords, the finely tuned shot logistics of Scorched Earth, the adorable roster of Kirby's Dreamland, the spirit of a TI-83 graphing calculator.

SINE SINE COSINE SINE THREE POINT ONE FOUR ONE FIVE NINE

  • 4-player support through a combo of keyboard (2 players max) and Xbox 360 controller
  • 6 wild 'n weaponized functions including fan favourite Csc^2
  • 8 monochromatic characters with which to duel along the mathematical axes


KEYBOARD CONTROLS FOR 2 PLAYERS: arrows + spacebar, WASD + F
(JoyToKey recommended for USB gamepad users)

MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS (v0.0.2)
OS: Windows XP SP2 (Windows 7 recommended)
CPU: Intel dual core 1.6 GHz
Memory: 1 GB
GPU: DirectX® 9.0 / Shader Model 2.0 support
HDD: 55 MB free
Other: XNA Framework 4.0

** Developed by Tyler Cinkant & Trevor McAleese of Gigatross Games over a 36-hour self-imposed game jam in 2015. We'd be thrilled if you and a pal (or three) gave it a play! **
